short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights new comments when you revisit a comments page on reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension highlights new comments on a link page in reddit when you revisit a link.

To jump between "new links", simply use shortcut keys "Shift+Up" & "Shift+Down".
